Parameters.Parameter: One of the example maps that comes with TileMill - a bright & colorful world map that blends retro and high-tech with its folded paper texture and interactive flag tooltips.

Datasource.Parameter: (SELECT ST_Affine(the_geom, sin(pi()/2), cos(pi()/2), cos(pi()/2), -sin(pi()/2), 0, 0) AS the_geom FROM "ne_10m_admin_0_countries") as "country-fill"
(SELECT ST_Affine(the_geom, sin(pi()/2), cos(pi()/2), cos(pi()/2), -sin(pi()/2), 0, 0) AS the_geom FROM "ne_10m_rivers_lake_centerlines") as "rivers"
(SELECT ST_Affine(the_geom, sin(pi()/2), cos(pi()/2), cos(pi()/2), -sin(pi()/2), 0, 0) AS the_geom FROM "ne_10m_lakes") as "lakes"
(SELECT ST_Affine(the_geom, sin(pi()/2), cos(pi()/2), cos(pi()/2), -sin(pi()/2), 0, 0) AS the_geom FROM "ne_10m_admin_1_states_provinces_lines") as "state"
(SELECT ST_Affine(the_geom, sin(pi()/2), cos(pi()/2), cos(pi()/2), -sin(pi()/2), 0, 0) AS the_geom FROM "ne_10m_admin_0_disputed_areas") as "admin-0-line-disputed"
(SELECT ST_Affine(the_geom, sin(pi()/2), cos(pi()/2), cos(pi()/2), -sin(pi()/2), 0, 0) AS the_geom FROM "ne_10m_admin_0_boundary_lines_land") as "admin-0-line-land"
(SELECT ST_Affine(the_geom, sin(pi()/2), cos(pi()/2), cos(pi()/2), -sin(pi()/2), 0, 0) AS the_geom FROM "ne_10m_glaciated_areas") as "glacier"
(SELECT ST_Affine(the_geom, sin(pi()/2), cos(pi()/2), cos(pi()/2), -sin(pi()/2), 0, 0) AS the_geom FROM "ne_10m_geographic_lines") as "geo-lines"
(SELECT ST_Affine(the_geom, sin(pi()/2), cos(pi()/2), cos(pi()/2), -sin(pi()/2), 0, 0) AS the_geom FROM "ne_10m_admin_0_label_points") as "country-name"
(SELECT ST_Affine(the_geom, sin(pi()/2), cos(pi()/2), cos(pi()/2), -sin(pi()/2), 0, 0) AS the_geom FROM "ne_10m_populated_places_simple") as "cities"
